lines.text: declare string variable with name word
read variable NumOfWords from the input

lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < NumOfWords ; i ++ )

lines.text: read from the input to word
if length of word is greater than 10
print first character of word , length of word - 2 and last character of word
lines.code: cout << word [ 0 ] << word . length ( ) - 2 << word [ word . length ( ) - 1 ] << endl ;
